title: Drawing, "Design for andiron", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red, green watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Rectangular panel, incised with a diamond pattern, drapery below, is supported by two posts consisting of claw feet, a square panel, and a female Egyptian bust at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for andiron", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red, green watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-159.
